data.text: I guess just, you know, keep getting up after every toxic,

data.text: But I think with hecklers in general,

data.text: from some idiot that literally misunderstands

data.text: I think that's the thing with hecklers.

data.text: They think that, like,

translation.text: Họ nghĩ rằng, như,

data.text: They're like, "I helped her with her comedy skit."

data.text: It's like, "No, you didn't help me, you wild moron.

title: How To Handle a Heckler: Rachel Feinstein
